fundraiser.title: Matt’s Freedom Fundraiser
fundraiser.description: Matt’s Freedom Fundraiser is about helping me, Matt Raynor, a C5 quadriplegic, transition from life in a nursing home into independent living after a year and a half of institutional care. I’ve secured a housing subsidy but am currently searching for an accessible apartment that can accommodate my needs. Until then, I’m raising funds to cover essential living expenses so I can safely and sustainably move out.
goals: Cover out-of-pocket caregiver costs during coverage gaps
Pay for rent, groceries, utilities, and personal care supplies
Purchase and maintain medical essentials like catheters and gloves
Set up a Special Needs Trust to protect Medicaid eligibility
Fund transportation and accessibility needs during apartment search

creator.name: Matt Raynor
creator.goal: Regain independence and dignity through housing and self-employment

status.care: Receiving Medicaid-funded long-term care, gaps in coverage exist
status.income: Not currently employed; seeking sustainable freelance/remote work

media.video: Promotional video explaining fundraiser and journey

how_to_help: Share the fundraiser on social media
Suggest accessible apartments on Long Island
Invite media or local press contacts to feature Matt's story
